thread.title: OVATION Brings Mobile to Microsoft Cloud Platform
thread.title_full: OVATION Brings Mobile to Microsoft Cloud Platform

author: Carolyn Taylor
title: OVATION Brings Mobile to Microsoft Cloud Platform
text:
OVATION Wireless Management, a provider of managed mobility services, today announced their use of Microsoft Azure to develop new managed mobility tools for both enterprise customers and their employees. “Azure is one of the most scalable cloud development platforms available. The robust library of on demand resources, allows us to quickly establish and scale our development environments for ASP.net, WordPress, and Magento eCommerce applications," said Jeff Reep, CIO of OVATION Wireless Management.
OVATION’s managed mobility solutions include a private portal for enterprises to review their optimized wireless invoices and detailed usage for their corporate liable devices. Azure’s Multi-Factor Authentication provides a safeguard in accessing customer data and applications, which enables us to meet customer data security compliance requirements.
OVATION Wireless Management customizes a managed mobility program to the exact needs of each customer. This approach is the basis for a high level of customer satisfaction and for OVATION’s continued growth. Also with the growth of BYOD in the enterprise, Azure is perfectly suited to provide a centralized resource to employees for assistance with wireless and other discounts.
The Employee Value Program (EVP), owned and operated by Oasis Mobility, a related entity of OVATION Wireless Management, is a private online portal for companies and employees to receive expert customer service for all their wireless needs for wireless devices and services. EVP also provides many other resources such as online shopping for discounts on thousands of popular retail services, a Buy Back Program to obtain cash back for old smartphones and tablets and a wireless accessory store with discounted brand name wireless accessories.
About OVATION Wireless Management:
OVATION Wireless Management provides result-driven managed mobility services, to domestic and global enterprises, that are guaranteed to pay for themselves. With over 300 years of combined wireless experience, OVATION delivers a demonstrable value proposition and expert customer service. For more information visit http://www.ovationwireless.com or call 1-866-207-2111.
About the Employee Value Program:
The Employee Value Program offers a no cost centralized white glove service for small and medium sized businesses and their employees to add wireless carrier discounts, add new carrier service, inquire about upgrades, buy accessories, and realize valuable savings in our EVP Marketplace with over 200,000 items.
